QueryList.Join: <%if(has(address)){%> AND address=:address <%}%> <%else if (has(address_not)){%> and A.address <> :address_not <%}%> <%else if (has(address_li)){%> and A.address like '%'||:address_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(name)){%> AND name=:name <%}%> <%else if (has(name_not)){%> and A.name <> :name_not <%}%> <%else if (has(name_li)){%> and A.name like '%'||:name_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(id)){%> AND id=:id <%}%> <%else if (has(id_not)){%> and A.id <> :id_not <%}%> <%else if (has(id_li)){%> and A.id like '%'||:id_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(tenantId)){%> AND tenantId=:tenantId <%}%> <%else if (has(tenantId_not)){%> and A.tenantId <> :tenantId_not <%}%> <%else if (has(tenantId_li)){%> and A.tenantId like '%'||:tenantId_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(phone)){%> AND phone=:phone <%}%> <%else if (has(phone_not)){%> and A.phone <> :phone_not <%}%> <%else if (has(phone_li)){%> and A.phone like '%'||:phone_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(remark)){%> AND remark=:remark <%}%> <%else if (has(remark_not)){%> and A.remark <> :remark_not <%}%> <%else if (has(remark_li)){%> and A.remark like '%'||:remark_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(extend)){%> AND extend=:extend <%}%> <%else if (has(extend_not)){%> and A.extend <> :extend_not <%}%> <%else if (has(extend_li)){%> and A.extend like '%'||:extend_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(sex)){%> AND sex=:sex <%}%> <%else if (has(sex_not)){%> and A.sex <> :sex_not <%}%> <%else if (has(sex_li)){%> and A.sex like '%'||:sex_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(idCard)){%> AND idCard=:idCard <%}%> <%else if (has(idCard_not)){%> and A.idCard <> :idCard_not <%}%> <%else if (has(idCard_li)){%> and A.idCard like '%'||:idCard_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(position)){%> AND position=:position <%}%> <%else if (has(position_not)){%> and A.position <> :position_not <%}%> <%else if (has(position_li)){%> and A.position like '%'||:position_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(pic)){%> AND pic=:pic <%}%> <%else if (has(pic_not)){%> and A.pic <> :pic_not <%}%> <%else if (has(pic_li)){%> and A.pic like '%'||:pic_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(origin)){%> AND origin=:origin <%}%> <%else if (has(origin_not)){%> and A.origin <> :origin_not <%}%> <%else if (has(origin_li)){%> and A.origin like '%'||:origin_li||'%' <%}%> <%if (has(orderby)) {%> ORDER BY A.${orderby} <%if (has(sort)){%> ${sort} <%}else{%> ASC <%}%> <%}%>
